channel.title: nostalgia on Krossovochkin
channel.description: Recent content in nostalgia on Krossovochkin

item.title: Raising old project from the depth
item.description: Introduction I am an Android Developer from the beginning of my professional career. Straight from the University, I’ve jumped into Android development, and to this day continue my journey. During that time I’ve worked in different areas: enterprise, product business applications, SDK development. But all that started with mobile game development. The first project I took part in was called “nICE”. It was a match-3-like game. It was at the time when there was Android Market and not Google Play Store, when we used Eclipse and not Android Studio and, of course, used Java.
